mapper.select: select id as id, project_id as projectId, invoice_code as invoiceCode, invoice_type as invoiceType, amount as amount, trice as trice, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, status as status from t_customer_billing where project_id=#{projectId} order by trice desc
